official_title: A resolution to disapprove synthetic fuel action 1981-1 (relating to a loan guarantee for the Oil Shale Corporation).

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives does not favor the synthetic fuel action numbered 1981-1 received by the Congress on September 9, 1981, (relates to a loan guarantee for the Oil Shale Corporation).
